The following table gives an example of an application of this test:
TABLE2
Case 1:ABCD~G
Case 2:~ABCDG
Case 3:A~BC~DG
Because Case 1 does not provide an instance where Gis present, it cannot
eliminate any candidate as a necessary condition of G. Case 2 eliminates A
as a necessary condition ofG,since it shows that Gcan be present without A
being present. Case 3 then eliminates both Band D,leaving Cas the only
